"Go big or go home!<br>Yeah! Let's have:
"Besides, this is ARKS! We're interplanetary
jet-setters, and I think that'd make a lovely
theme for this party. Don't you?"

"With that in mind, here's what I need. I want
you to take a whirlwind tour through the
Naberian Greenscape. Go as fast as you can!"

"I'll be watching you the whole time, keeping
an eye out for things I could use. Don't worry,
it'll be a breeze!"

"せっかくやるんだったら、盛大に！
そう、派手に、楽しめるように！"

"それにわたしたちは、いろんな惑星を
渡るアークスなんだから
それもふまえた催しにしたいの！"

"ということで、お願いっ！
さくさくっとナベリウスの森林を
回ってきて！"

"それをモニタリングして
使えそうなものを見繕うからさ。
このとーりっ！"
